name: Meltdown (itch) (UntrainedMonkey)
description:
Find and destroy the reactor without being caught by the facility's team of security robots. You'll need to use key cards, portals to a parallel dimension and mine's that when triggered teleport a robot out of your way.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
  • Q - Switch weapons
  • F - Toggle flashlight
  • LMB - Shoot/Place
  • C or L Ctrl - Crouch
